mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT BOARD_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICK, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DT FROM BOARD JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CODE) FULL JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, BOARD_NAME FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_ID) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING (BOARD_CODE) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
